resources.string: RPG Character Creation Quiz
Welcome to the RPG character creation quiz app!
I feel as if playing a non-human race breaks game immersion.
I prefer to be a jack of all trades as opposed to a master of one or two.
I value skilled diplomacy or the ability to haggle.
I prefer for my character to be more far elegant and more intelligent than a human is.
I prefer for my character to be part of a very rare and mystical race, such as elves or gnomes.
I prefer for my character to be immortal, or incapable of dying from old age.
I prefer for my character to be ugly and brutal. The humans in my characters universe might use stories of my kinsmen to scare their children.
I prefer to be part of a large horde or monstrous creatures which utilize numbers to overcome their foes.
I prefer to my character to be larger than a human, and much stronger.
I prefer to fight my enemies from close quarters as opposed to from a distance.
I prefer to figut using physical means as opposed to magic.
I prefer to fight on the frontlines, no trickery required.
Would you prefer to take the range or melee quiz?
Would you prefer to play a thief or a warrior?
Would you prefer to deal damage or heal and protect your allies?
I prefer to heal and protect my allies as opposed to dealing damage to the enemy.
Would you prefer to attack and defend using physical or magical means?
I would prefer to utilize my inventions such as traps and turrets to deal physical damage from a ranged position.
It would appear that you prefer to play a character which is neither human, elf, orc, goblin, or gnome. More questions will come soon to determine what type of fantasy race you should play.
It would appear that you don\'t have a playstyle that you strongly prefer. More questions will come at a later date to give a more accurate answer.

You prefer to take on the world as a human or human-like character. Battle against monstrous barbarians, or undead sorcerers as a normal human. You need no special race bonuses. Numbers and a belief in your fellow man are all you require! Strive for greatness and hope your accomplishments are remembered; after all, humans are only one in a billion.
It appears that you like human characters. Would you like for your character to be human or human-like?

You enjoy playing your adventure as an orc, or orc-like character. Beauty is for the elves, compassion is for the humans. You require none of these things. You are an orc, hardened by battle, and uglier than piss. Strike fear into your enemies as one of an unstoppable horde. Gnash your teeth and let loose a gutteral roar orc.
It appaears that you like to play Orcish characters. Would you like your character to be an orc?

You are an elf, immortal and graceful. You possess wisdom long since lost by the mortal races, and use it to protect the last remnants of a once great kingdom. Prepare for battle, grab your bow or your staff, and protect your people elf!
It appears that you like to play an elf or elf-like character. Would you like to play an elf?

You enjoy the mysticism of the elvss, but feel as if they are too large, and too proud. A goofier take on a mystical force for good is more your speed. Enjoy the game as some form of gnome or fairy. You can become an adorable force, and one which should not be crossed.
It appears that you would like to play some type of gnome or fairy. Would you like to play a gnome or fairy?

You enjoy the brutal and savage nature of orcs, but do not need to be that large. Visciousness and your cruel sense of cunning will get you through the game. Strike off into the world as a small, but cruel goblin.
It appears that you would like to play some form of goblin. Would you like your character to be a goblin?

Well pick up your weapon of choice, dawn your armor if you feel like at, and start smacking things. A warrior is the most suitable playstyle for you. Magic is for the intellectuals, a bow for the agile, but you value strength and stamina above all. Step upon the battlefield with one thought in mind, victory or death!

Take to the shadows and ambush your enemy. You prefer to play a rogue and a thief. Honor and glorious battle mean nothing to you. You prefer to fight another day as opposed to dying to a superior foe. There is no shame in that, and you know it. After all, what does honor matter to a dead man?

You are an intellectual. Your thirst for knowledge is matched only by your ability to retain information. During childhood you discovered that a keen mind can defeat a sharpened blade. Head out into the world in a futile attempt to quell the insatiable thirst for knowledge. You are a sorcerer, unbound by the limits of the physical world, rule or serve as you see fit, for the world is your book.

The gods have always been your friends. You choose to empower yourself through prayer, enabling yourself to make use of their lofty powers. Light some candles, crack open a book of prayer, and channel the powers of the gods upon your enemies.

You prefer to utilize the magic of the elements to buff your weapons. This allows you to fight with powers beyong your normal melee fighter. Burn your foes with fire, knock them back with gusts of wind. Enjoy the options presented when you control the Elements!

You understand that your allies must be protected and healed to make an impact on your world. This knowledge led you to become a Paladin. Utilize holy magic to heal and protect your allies. You are the protector, the bulwark that guards your people, and you always place them first.

You enjoy making use of your mind to set and spring traps for you enemies. Bear traps, tripwires, turrets, it does not matter to you! You are an engineer and you will use your inventions to overcome any obstacle!

You like to stalk your prey and dispatch them from afar. Whether it be with a gun, a bow, or a spear your prey will never know what hit them. You are a hunter, the apex predator wherever you travel. For the hunt!
Take the character playstyle quiz!
Take the race quiz!
Yes
No
Strongly Agree
Agree
Neutral
Disagree
Strongly Disagree
